reviewText: I love this dvd it is such a great way to learn so much about President Hinckley.  Such an honor to learn of his examples to live by

Such a wonderful thoughtful inspiring story of Gordon B Hinckley's life. You gain such tremendous insights inside his way of viewing life and always seeing the good in every situation and finding ways to grow and become better by the adversity he experienced and became a better man of God because of it!
What a very interesting live he had. I highly recommend this video. I order it after watch it on D V D from Netflix. I decide to have a copy  for my collection.
Received it early. Thank you. Great seller Item as described and very happy at this end.
